title: Jenrick defends calling Handsworth 'worst-integrated'
description: The shadow justice secretary stands by his comments about the Birmingham area amid sharp criticism.
content:
Shadow justice secretary Robert Jenrick has defended remarks he made in March about the Handsworth area of Birmingham, calling it "one of the worst-integrated places" he had ever been to.
In a recording reportedly made during a dinner and published b... [3569 chars]

title: 'UK Gaza protests going ahead' and 'Romp in Peace, Jilly'
description: Protests on the two year anniversary of the Israel-Gaza war and Jilly Cooper's death make the papers.
content: The UK's Gaza protests are "going ahead today on anniversary of October 7 massacre" writes The i Paper, acknowledging the two years since Hamas attacked Israel. Prime Minister Sir Keir Starmer has denounced the protests as "unpatriotic". Elsewhere, a... [2836 chars]

title: Renewables overtake coal as world's biggest source of electricity
description: Developing countries lead the historic clean energy charge but the US and EU rely more on fossil fuels than before, a think tank study shows.
content:
Renewable energy overtook coal as the world's leading source of electricity in the first half of this year - a historic first, according to new data from the global energy think tank Ember.
Electricity demand is growing around the world but the growt... [3222 chars]

title: Met police disrupt suspected international smuggling ring in UK’s ‘largest’ phone theft crackdown
description: The criminal organisation is believed to have smuggled up to 40,000 stolen phones from the UK to China over the past 12 months
content:
Police have disrupted an international network suspected of smuggling tens of thousands of stolen phones from the UK in its largest operation to tackle phone theft in London, the Metropolitan police said.

title: Snapchat users share fury at upcoming fees for Memories storage
description: Snap said only a small number of users would be affected by the changes, but many online disagree.
content:
"Half of my life is on this app and now they expect us to pay for it."
One-star reviews and a sense of injustice have dominated online discussion since the popular messaging app Snapchat became the latest tech firm to put a price tag on a service peo... [3852 chars]
